title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama GitHub repo providing the CLI and server to run Llama 2, Code Llama, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for interacting with the Ollama server; install via pip install ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; install via npm install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration allowing Ollama models to be used as LLM or chat components in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now named Open WebUI) with chat history, model management, RAG, and user auth.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama providing synchronous & asynchronous APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-written Go CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API for easier model pulling, listing, and deletion.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code completion.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing how to build RAG pipelines with Ollama embeddings and vector stores like Chroma or Weaviate.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with local Ollama models via slash commands; written in TypeScript.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node selector and PVC for model cache.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated list of GGUF models tested with Ollama and the corresponding Modelfile snippets.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot using Bolt framework to expose Ollama chat as a Slack slash command or app mention.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language client for Ollama with async HTTP support and native JSON mapping.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with Tokio.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library and CLI for Ollama with support for chat, completion, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot that combines Ollama with Chroma vector store for question-answering over uploaded documents.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a side-panel chat powered by a local Ollama model for note-taking assistance.

title: ollama-telegram-bot
summary: Telegram bot using python-telegram-bot library to chat with Ollama models privately or in groups.
